name: Magical Highschool Romance: My heart can't choose between these handsome boys!!!
name_original: Magical Highschool Romance: My heart can't choose between these handsome boys!!!
description:
Oh gosh, today is my first day at my new highschool, and I'm sooo nervous!

I wonder what kind of people I'll meet in this "fandom academy"... This is so exciting!!

As I arrive, I am filled with a myriad of emotions rushing through my heart. And when I open the door to my classroom...

Who's this? Sans the Skeleton from Undertale?! In my class?! How unexpected! Him along many other characters I know and love.

A strange sensation envelops me. Could my heart be going *doki doki*???????????

Enter Magical Highschool Romance. TOTALLY a Dating Visual Novel featuring your favorite characters from fiction.

Who will your story be about? What will you write today? It's yours to find out!
